mapper.select: select id,version,star from t_article where id = #{id}

select count(*) from t_article a left join s_dict_item i on a.type = i.id where a.status = 1
and i.id = #{type}

select c.content,m.id as memberId,c.id,m.avatar,m.nick_name as nickName,c.create_at as createAt from t_article_comment c left join t_member m on m.id = c.member_id where c.`status` = 1 and c.article_id = #{id} and c.content != '' and m.status = 1
select count(*) from t_article_comment_favour f where f.`status` = 1 and f.comment_id = #{id}
select id,comment_id as commentId,member_id as memberId,`status`,version from t_article_comment_favour where comment_id = #{commentId} and member_id = #{memberId}
select count(*) from t_article_comment where article_id = #{articleId} and member_id = #{memberId} and status = 1 and TO_DAYS(create_at) = TO_DAYS(NOW())
select count(*) from t_article_comment where article_id = #{id} and status = 1
